name: cfreportparam
description:
Passes input parameters to a ColdFusion Report Builder
 report definition. Allowed inside cfreport tag bodies only.

params.name: name
params.description:
Variable name for data that is passed. The ColdFusion
 Report Builder report definition must include an input
 parameter that matches this name.

params.name: value
params.description: Value of the data that is sent.

params.name: chart
params.description: Name of the chart contained in a report or subreport. The value of this attribute must match Name property of a chart defined in the Report Builder report.

params.name: query
params.description: Query value to pass to a subreport or chart. The ColdFusion query must contain at least all of the columns included in the Report Builder query.

params.name: series
params.description: Ordinal number of a chart series to use for the query. This attribute is valid only when the chart attribute is specified.

params.name: style
params.description: Style in CSS format for a subreport.
